product_name: Nite Ize SaddleLite LED Bike Seat Bag
long_description: The Nite Ize SaddleLite LED bike seat bag offers enough room for levers, patch kits and a tube and includes a bright, weather-resistant LED to enhance visibility when you're riding in the dark.
short_description: The Nite Ize SaddleLite LED bike seat bag offers enough room for levers, patch kits and a tube and includes a bright, weather-resistant LED to enhance visibility when you're riding in the dark.
